001package com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.ColorRangeSensor;
004import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.navigation.DistanceUnit;
005
006public class ColorDistanceSensor extends Sensor<ColorRangeSensor> implements IDistanceSensor, IColorSensor {
007
008    private DistanceUnit distanceUnit;
009    private double dist;
010    private double light;
011    private int color;
012
013    public ColorDistanceSensor(String name) {
014        super(name);
015        distanceUnit = DistanceUnit.CM;
016    }
017
018    @Override
019    public String LogLine() {
020        int alpha = (color >> 24) & 0xFF;
021        if (alpha != 0 && alpha != 0xFF) {
022            return logData(
023                String.format(
024                    "d:%f1.2%s A(%d)R(%d)G(%d)B(%d) [%f1.3]",
025                    dist,
026                    distanceUnit,
027                    alpha,
028                    (color >> 16) & 0xFF,
029                    (color >> 8) & 0xFF,
030                    color & 0xFF,
031                    light
032                )
033            );
034        } else {
035            return logData(
036                String.format(
037                    "d:%f1.2%s R(%d)G(%d)B(%d) [%f1.3]",
038                    dist,
039                    distanceUnit,
040                    (color >> 16) & 0xFF,
041                    (color >> 8) & 0xFF,
042                    color & 0xFF,
043                    light
044                )
045            );
046        }
047    }
048
049    public ColorDistanceSensor(ColorRangeSensor device, String nm) {
050        super(device, nm);
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public double getDistance(DistanceUnit unit) {
055        ColorRangeSensor device = getRawDevice();
056        double val = dist;
057        if (device != null) {
058            val = device.getDistance(unit);
059            dist = distanceUnit.fromUnit(unit, val);
060        }
061        return val;
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public ColorDistanceSensor onUnit(DistanceUnit unit) {
066        distanceUnit = unit;
067        return this;
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public DistanceUnit getUnit() {
072        return distanceUnit;
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public int argb() {
077        ColorRangeSensor device = getRawDevice();
078        if (device != null) {
079            color = device.argb();
080        }
081        return color;
082    }
083
084    public double getLight() {
085        ColorRangeSensor device = getRawDevice();
086        if (device != null) {
087            light = device.getRawLightDetected();
088        }
089        return light;
090    }
091}
